description: The most relevant fact about the Biden administration’s current position on the war against Gaza is this: There is no Israeli war crime too extreme for Joe Biden to consider pausing, to say nothing of cutting off, the flow of U.S. weapons and financial support for Israel’s war of annihilation.
title: With Netanyahu threatening Rafah invasion, Biden prepares to send Israel more bombs

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Shargh addressed the U.S. sanctions approach against Iran and wrote: So far, Joe Biden's government has imposed more than 55 separate sanctions against Iran, targeting more than 550 individuals and institutions.
title: Their only pride is sanctions

description: TEHRAN – Iran and Qatar's foreign ministers, Hossein Amir Abdollahian and Sheikh Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani, engaged in a significant telephone conversation on Thursday.
title: Iran, Qatar discuss latest developments in Gaza war

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s foreign ministry spokesman has called for global action to stop Israeli atrocities in Palestine, condemning the recent brutal incident where Israeli troops opened fire on hundreds waiting for food aid southwest of Gaza City.
title: Iran condemns Israel’s blatant attack on Gazans who were collecting food aid

description: TEHRAN- U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin has admitted the Israeli military has killed more than 25,000 women and children since October 7.
title: Pentagon: “Over 25,000 women and children” killed in Gaza

description: U.S. Air Force Airman Aaron Bushnell, 25, who poured gasoline on himself and set himself aflame in front of the Israeli embassy in Washington and died shouting “Free Palestine” until he could no more, made himself a beloved martyr of sorts to billions of people around the globe.
title: Young Aaron Bushnell was fighting fires with his own fire…

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Foreign Minister, Hossein Amir Abdollahian, has stressed that the Iranian government and system depend on the people's support, adding that democracy and human rights in Iran are stronger than those in the UK.
title: Democracy, human rights are much stronger in Iran than in Britain: FM

description: TEHRAN – With millions of Iranians gearing up for travel during the upcoming spring holidays, Tourism Minister Ezzatollah Zarghami has urged provincial officials to ensure the highest level of service for holidaymakers.
title: Iran plans to serve Nowruz tourists deservedly

description: TEHRAN - Israel has been committing acts of genocide, massacres, war crimes and crimes against humanity with impunity in the Gaza Strip since launching war on the besieged Palestinian territory nearly five months ago.
title: Barbaric bombardment of breadline

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Representative to the Human Rights Council, Hamid Ahmadi, strongly criticized Germany's suitability as a member of the council, questioning its moral, human rights, and political credibility.
title: Iran questions Germany's moral, human rights, political credibility

description: TEHRAN — An Iranian military adviser was martyred in an airstrike by the Israeli forces on the Syrian port of Banias.
title: Iranian military adviser martyred in Syria

description: More than 200 MPs from 12 countries have committed themselves to trying to persuade their governments to impose a ban on arms sales to Israel, arguing they will not be complicit in “Israel’s grave violation of international law” in its assault on Gaza, The Guardian reported.
title: Politicians from 12 countries unite to press for arms ban on Israel

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Ambassador to Kuwait, Mohammad Toutounchi, addressed the challenges surrounding visa issuance for Iranian tradesmen, acknowledging the recent visa-related difficulties faced by Iranian citizens.
title: Kuwaiti companies' endorsement facilitates visa issuance for Iranian traders, says ambassador

description: People in the Gaza Strip are risking their lives to find food, water and other supplies such is the level of hunger and despair amid the unrelenting Israeli assault, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Friday, Reuters reported.
title: WHO: Health system in Gaza 'more than on its knees'

description: Thousands of people have staged mass demonstrations in Yemen to express firm solidarity with Palestinians amidst Israeli attacks on Gaza, calling on the country’s military to step up anti-Israeli operation in the Red Sea and respond to U.S.-British aggression.
title: Yemenis stage mass rallies against Israeli war on Gaza

description: TEHRAN- Participation in the current parliamentary elections has surpassed that of the previous term, as stated by Constitutional Council spokesperson Hadi Tahan Nazif.
title: Constitutional Council confirms surge in voter turnout for parliamentary elections

description: Seventeen international aid agencies have signed a joint statement calling on the European Union and member states to resume funding to the UN Agency for Palestinian Refugees (UNRWA).
title: Aid agencies urge EU to resume UNRWA funding

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi pointed out the inclusivity of the elections held on March 1, saying both citizens and candidates see it as their duty to take part in national votes.
title: President Raisi hails all-inclusive Friday vote

description: TEHRAN - Before the voting day had even arrived in Iran, Western media outlets became awash with reports and analyses predicting that Iranians would not turn up at the polling stations this year.
title: Iranians rebuff electoral boycott calls

description: TEHRAN - Some 22 million visits to Iranian cultural heritage sites and museums have been registered during the first 11 months of the current Persian year, which began on March 21, 2023.
title: Visits to cultural heritage sites and museums reach 22 million

description: TEHRAN – Chinese archaeometrist, Dr. Yimin Yang, participating in the Archaeometry Scientific Conference held at the Art University of Isfahan, underscored that arranging joint events in the field of Archaeology and Archaeometry could lead to both framing a mutual understanding and strengthening intercultural communication between two nations.
title: Iran, China explore archaeometry achievements

description: TEHRAN - A fascinating discovery in Iran has unveiled what scientists believe to be a Bronze Age lipstick, possibly the oldest ever found, shedding light on the ancient art of cosmetic adornment dating back to the second millennium BC.
title: 3,700-year-old lipstick unearthed in Iran could be oldest ever found

description: TEHRAN - A cultural heritage activist has voiced concerns over plans to cultivate approximately 30 hectares of land within the boundaries of the ancient city of Bishapur.
title: Cultural heritage activist warns of potential threats to UNESCO-listed site in southern Iran

description:
* A collection of paintings by Jalal Fatemi is currently on display in an exhibition at Ev Gallery.
Entitled “Trunks Talk”, the exhibition runs until March 12 at the gallery located at No.5, Arabi Alley, North Kheradmand St., Karim Khan Ave.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN-The Cinematheque of the Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) will screen Indian director and screenwriter Satyajit Ray’s film “Pather Panchali” on Monday.
title: Tehran cinematheque to review Satyajit Ray’s “Pather Panchali”

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian video game “Fake Emperors” made by animator and game developer Mehrdad Rezaei has received four nominations at the Game Development Awards, Game Connection America 2024.
title: Iranian video game “Fake Emperors” receives 4 nominations at Game Connection America

description: TEHRAN-Famous Iranian actor Mostafa Zamani has performed in the Iraqi TV series “Amirli,” directed by Ahmed Ibrahim Ahmed, which is going to be released soon by Noravision.
title: Mostafa Zamani’s Iraqi TV series “Amirli” set for Ramadan release

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Oil Minister Javad Oji has said the contracts signed with Russian companies to develop eight oil fields have helped his country add more than 200,000 barrels to its daily production.
title: Contracts with Russia lead to 200,000-barrel increase in Iran daily oil output: Oji

description: Beijing- China International Press Communication Center (CIPCC), under the China Public Diplomacy Association (CPDA), has initiated a program to build a platform for the media from countries around the world, especially developing countries, to observe China and study development in this country.
title: China brings together journalists from all over the world

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Finance and Economic Affairs Minister Ehsan Khandouzi said the country’s stock market has provided 6.0 quadrillion rials (about $12 billion) of funding for various economic sectors since the beginning of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023).
title: Stock market provides $12b of funding for various sectors in 11 months

description: TEHRAN - The value of Iran’s foreign trade including oil and technical engineering services reached $138.8 billion in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-February 19, 2024), the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) said.
title: Iran’s foreign trade exceeds $138b in 11 months

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Minister of Energy Ali-Akbar Mehrabian and his Tajik counterpart Daler Juma have reviewed joint projects between the two countries in a video conference session.
title: Iranian, Tajik energy ministers discuss joint projects

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran’s Planning and Budget Organization (PBO) has said 3.0 quadrillion rials (over $6.0 billion) has been allocated for construction and infrastructure projects in the next Iranian calendar year’s (starts on March 20) national budget bill.
title: Iran allocates over $6b to infrastructure projects

description: TEHRAN - Head of National Iranian Oil Refining and Distribution Company (NIORDC) Jalil Salari and Iraq’s Deputy Oil Minister for Refining Affairs Hamid Younes met on Thursday in Tehran to discuss expanding cooperation between the two countries in the refining sector.
title: Tehran, Baghdad explore avenues of co-op in refining sector

description: TEHRAN – Some 213.692 million tons of commodities have been loaded and unloaded at Iranian ports in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21.2023-February 19, 2024), According to a report by the Transport and Urban Development Ministry.
title: Over 213m tons of goods loaded, unloaded at ports in 11 months

description: TEHRAN – Ali Salajeqeh, the Head of the Department of Environment, has called it essential to set up regional and global centers to deal with sand and dust storms.
title: Regional, global centers ‘essential’ to tackle SDSs, Iran suggests

description: TEHRAN – During the coronavirus pandemic, the health ministry’s traditional medicine office carried out more than 120 research projects, leading to the production of twenty drugs to help treat the disease.
title: 20 traditional medicines helped treat covid-19: official

description: TEHRAN –A comprehensive document between the Islamic Republic of Iran and the Russian Federation has been signed by Deputy Health Minister Mohammad-Hossein Niknam and his Russian counterpart Sergei Glagolev.
title: Iran, Russia sign document on health cooperation

description: TEHRAN – Persepolis football club are the best Iranian team in the FIFA Club World Cup standings.
title: Persepolis the best Iranian team in FIFA Club World Cup standings

description: TEHRAN- Stay up-to-date and informed on the March 1 elections in Iran by following the Tehran Times on Twitter. Don't miss out on the latest updates and news from the Iranian people as they cast their ballots.
title: Stay tuned with Tehran Times

description: TEHRAN - The Leader cast his ballot in the Imam Khomeini Hussainiyah in ballot box number 110 in the presence of more than a hundred journalists and cameramen from local and international media outlets.
title: Ayatollah Khamenei votes in parliamentary and Assembly of Experts elections

description: TEHRAN – The polls opened across Iran at 8 a.m. local time (0430) on Friday for parliamentary and Assembly of Experts elections.
title: Parliamentary and Assembly of Experts elections begin in Iran

description: TEHRAN – The polls opened across Iran at 8 a.m. local time (0430) on Friday for parliamentary and Assembly of Experts elections.
title: Parliamentary Assembly of Experts elections begin in Iran
